title: A bill to amend section 2007 of the Social Security Act to provide grant funding for additional Enterprise Communities, and for other purposes.
content: Enterprise Communities Enhancement Act of 2001 - Amends title XX of the Social Security Act to provide for: (1) additional State entitlements to grants for designated qualified enterprise communities, (2) funding for such grants. And (3) use of grant funds for revolving loan fund loans to residents, institutions, organizations, or businesses that hire disadvantaged adults and youths.
